tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EnergyConsumptionData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  house_id INT,
  business_id INT,
  date TIMESTAMP,
  consumption DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE EnergyConsumptionData (
    household_id INT,
    business_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    consumption_kwh NUMERIC,
    PRIMARY KEY (household_id, business_id, timestamp)
);
